summary: Jarrin Root now does 500 health damage.
descriptionHtml:
When you get to a certain point in the Dark Brotherhood quest line, Astird gives you a Jarrin Root, telling you that even a taste can cause instant death, but eating it, as I tested, only does 200 damage. Not exactly \"instant death.\"  This mod gives it the ability to do 500 damage.

Install: Extract .esp to Skyrim/Data Folder.

Uninstall:  Delete .esp.

Hey, also if anyone knows of a ReadMe Generator for Skyrim, I will give you kudos!
author: JohnBond007777
